mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.title, if(u.username is null, 'anomy', u.username) AS username FROM boards b LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON b.usersId = u.id
WHERE title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{row} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT bo.*, lo.id lovesId , if(lo.id IS NULL, 0, 1) isLoved, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loves WHERE boardsId = #{boardsId}) loveCount FROM boards bo LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM loves WHERE usersId = #{principalId}) lo ON bo.id = lo.boardsId WHERE bo.id = #{boardsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE boards SET usersId = null WHERE usersId = #{usersId}
